item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Apologize for posting this so close to game time, but here goes,

the World Junior final has come down to a meeting between team Canada and our old adversaries, Russia!!
This should be an awesome game and if you are any fan of hockey, and I know you are, then this historic matchup is not to be missed. Forget about the NHL (unless a Canadian team makes the cup), this will be the best game of the year. So on Wednesday night, forget about putting in overtime, studying for that critical exam, or tucking in junior. Grab your colours, a few beers/refreshments, and head on over to Andrew's place for another chapter in this historic encounter.

There will be munchies provided, but bring your own drinks!

Andrew's number 617-459-5145
Bruce's number 617-221-2041

Go Canada!!!!

Bruce

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: CANADA vs. RUSSIA!!!! GAME OF THE YEAR!!! *****NOT TO BE MISSED*****
